titleStmt.title: SII 8.217: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 217. (A.R. No. 620 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . maturaikoṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarkku yāṇṭu
muppatteṭṭāvatu tiruvalañcuḻi mahādevark=ku Iṟaiyili kuṭu
tta veṇṇāṭṭup putānkoṭṭakattuk kaḷanilan pattey mukkāley
Orumā Innilam patteymukkāley Orumāvum Ittevarkku veṇṭu
m nivantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Iṟai kaṭṭina nellu Eṇṇū
ṟ ṟaṟukalamum Itu śrīrājarāja rājakesaripanmarāṉa śrīrājarājatevark
ku yāṇṭu patineḻāvatu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷa nāḷ Aiympattira
ṇṭiṉāl tennavan tiruvin=taḷūrnāṭṭu muventaveḷānum
cerapuranāṭṭu muventaveḷānum nila maḷappittapaṭi paḻini
lam Uṭppaṭa nilaṉ patiṉaiñcey Āṟumāk kāṇik kiḻaraiye Orumā
vilum Ivvūrai Ūṭaṟuttup puṟavūrkaḷukkup pāyum vāykkālkaḷ
nilaṉ kāle yaraimā muntirikaik kiḻmukkāle munṟumāk kāṇi yaraikkāṇik kiḻ Eṭ
ṭumā nikki Irupūviḷaiyum nilam patiṉañcey Araimā varaikkāṇik kiḻaraiye
Orumāvarai muntirikaik kiḻaraiye yiraṇṭumāviṉāl veli nūṟṟukkala varicai
yāl nellu Āyirat taiññūṟṟuk kalaney mukkuṟuṇi Eḻunāḻi . yitil It
tevarkku Iṟuttuvarukinṟa nellu Eṇṇūṟ ṟaṟukalamum paḻampaṭiye
Ittevark kiṟuppatākavum nīkki Aḷantapaṭiyil Eṟivanta nilattāl I
ṟaikaṭṭina nellu Eḻunūṟṟu mukkalaney kuṟuṇi Eḻunāḻiyum Itteva
rey Ittevarkku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku kuṭuttu variyiliṭṭapaṭi . tirumakaḷ
pola perunilaccelviyun taṉakke yurimaipūṇṭamai manakkoḷak kāntaḷūrcā
lai kalamaṟuttaruḷi veṅkaināṭum kaṅkapāṭiyum nuḷampapāṭiyum taṭikaipāṭiyu
m kuṭamalaināṭum kollamuṅ kaliṅkamum Eṇṭicai pukaḻtaru Īḻamaṇṭalamum
Iraṭṭapāṭi Eḻaraiyilakkamum tiṇṭiṟalvenṟi taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa tanneḻil vaḷar
The inscription is incomplete; the continuation could not be traced.
Digital edition of SII 8.217 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
